articles.title: NFL Week 7 Power Rankings: Our 1-32 poll, plus the biggest lessons learned so far for every team
articles.summary: We reshuffled the teams in our rankings ahead of Week 7. Plus, here are the biggest lessons for each roster so far this season.

articles.title: Jones: Boys 'still in it,' open to defensive trade
articles.summary: Despite his team's uneven 2-3-1 start to the season, Cowboys owner Jerry Jones believes his team is "still in it," adding that Dallas is "in position to look at a trade" to help a struggling defense that is second to last in points allowed per game.

articles.title: Rodgers, Flacco happy to be part of 'Icy Hot bowl'
articles.summary: In Thursday night's Steelers-Bengals matchup, Aaron Rodgers and Joe Flacco will become just the second pair of opposing quarterbacks 40 or older in NFL history to start a regular or postseason game against each other.

articles.title: Ex-Jets star Mangold seeking kidney transplant
articles.summary: Former Jets center Nick Mangold, battling chronic kidney disease since a 2006 diagnosis for a rare genetic disorder, went public Tuesday with his need for a kidney transplant.

articles.title: WR Moore back in Chicago after night in hospital
articles.summary: Bears wide receiver DJ Moore is back in Chicago after spending the night in a Washington, D.C.-area hospital where he was evaluated for a groin injury, according to coach Ben Johnson.

articles.title: Ravens release veteran CJGJ 1 week after signing
articles.summary: The Ravens are releasing veteran safety C.J. Gardner-Johnson a week after signing him to their practice squad. He did not appear in a game for the team.

articles.title: Titans interim to stay positive for rookie QB Ward
articles.summary: Interim Titans coach Mike McCoy says he plans to clean up issues and use positive reinforcement to help guide rookie quarterback Cam Ward.

articles.title: Bengals veteran Wilson addresses benching
articles.summary: Logan Wilson, one of Cincinnati's core defensive players, was benched Sunday in favor of rookie Barrett Carter, who will be the starter going forward.

articles.title: Ex-NFL OL Leno retires on solemn anniversary
articles.summary: Former NFL offensive lineman Charles Leno Jr. announced his retirement on Tuesday -- two years to the day after his wife suffered a miscarriage.

articles.title: 🔥 Barnwell checks temperature on hottest seats
articles.summary: Should the Dolphins or Ravens make coaching changes? Is it time for a QB switch for the Jets? Might the Eagles consider moves in their secondary?

articles.title: Kiper's debut 2026 Big Board: Ranking the top 25 NFL draft prospects, plus position reports
articles.summary: Mel Kiper Jr. is stacking the top 25 players for the 2026 NFL draft, including four quarterbacks and one really good running back. See who makes the list.

articles.title: Browns' offensive struggles highlight offseason missteps: 'We got to get it fixed'
articles.summary: Cleveland's recent losses have magnified the team's failures to make key changes with personnel from last year.

articles.title: 'You don't replace Fred Warner': How will 49ers fill void left by NFL's top linebacker?
articles.summary: The 49ers will look to their youth to step up on defense, while the Nov. 4 trade deadline looms.

articles.title: What does Brian Callahan's firing mean for Cam Ward, 1-5 Titans?
articles.summary: Everything you need to know about Tennessee parting ways with Callahan, including what's next.

articles.title: 'That's my dude': Bijan Robinson talks connection with LeBron after 'MNF' win over Bills
articles.summary: The Atlanta Falcons running back said interacting with James is extra special because the longtime NBA star is his favorite athlete.

articles.title: Robinson fuels Falcons in win against Bills
articles.summary: Atlanta secures its biggest win of the young season with strong performances from its skill players.

articles.summary: Weekly individual and composite rankings for each position in PPR and IDP formats, as well as Eric Karabell's superflex ranks.

articles.summary: Highlighting free agent options after some performances and to help with injury concerns ahead of Week 7.

articles.title: 'That sucks': Who said it? Test your knowledge in the NFL Week 6 quote quiz
articles.summary: Week 6 in the NFL offered up-front quotes and self-reflection. Put your knowledge to the test with our quote quiz.

articles.title: Betting buzz: Patrick Mahomes new MVP fave after Week 6, Drake Maye's odds surge
articles.summary: Recent losses slow Josh Allen's MVP odds and allow Patrick Mahomes, Baker Mayfield and Drake Maye to rise.
